title: Express Talk: Inner and Outer by Andy Warhol
title_display: Express Talk: Inner and Outer Space by Andy Warhol
hero_caption: Andy Warhol. Still from Outer and Inner Space, 1965. ©2019 The Andy Warhol Museum, Pittsburgh, PA, a museum of Carnegie Institute. All rights reserved.
description:
Andy Warhol’s groundbreaking films were central to his radical reinvention of media. Join curatorial associate Suzie Oppenheimer to view and discuss Inner and Outer Space, one of hundreds of films inspired by a wide-range of genres and themes that Warhol made from 1963–68. This film is presented in its original 16mm format and on view in the Stone Gallery during the month of November.

Persons with disabilities who would like to request an accessibility accommodation for an Art Institute program are encouraged to send an email to access@artic.edu two weeks in advance of the program.
